title.rendered: Olympia’s Bob Zeigler wrote this smart article about nuclear weapons

content.rendered:
Bob has volunteered since the 1970s in the movement to abolish nuclear weapons.  He wrote this article in August and submitted it to Works In Progress with the hope that they’ll publish it in their September 2023 issue.  Here is Bob’s smart article:

Revised WIP Submission by Bob Zeigler on Nuclear Weapons
